thread.section_title: Bloomandwild Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bloomandwild | www.bloomandwild.com | 5 of 115
thread.title: Ann Evett

author: Ann Evett
title: Ann Evett
text:
I love sending flowers to friends and family nothing nicer, remembering a birthday, get well soon, just thinking about you, but in this time of endless working hours, tube travelling etc the worry has always been what time to arrange delivery, but with the post it through the letterbox the worry disappears.
The choice of flowers is quiet wonderful, I was trying to find an arrangement which would pull out the colours of my daughters tiles in her fireplace, the Adele I'm told looked both stunning and did the job perfectly.
My daughter was thrilled to arrive home an unexpected delivery,, and the pictures she sent where lovely.
Will definitely use this service again thank you
